name: Secretive
description:
Knowledge is Kept, Not Shared
Secretive cultures operate from the shadows, valuing discretion and information above all. They are masters of espionage, subtlety, and hidden agendas. What others don't know can't hurt them - but it can certainly help you.

options.name: Shadows and Secrets
options.description: Information is power, and you thrive on knowing what others don't. You regain 1 Resolve whenever you uncover a secret, successfully deceive someone, or complete a task while remaining undetected. However, being exposed or having your own secrets discovered causes you to lose 2 Resolve and gain paranoia (1 Stress). If you go more than three days without gathering new information or maintaining your network of contacts, you become anxious and gain 1 Stress. You can spend 1 Resolve to automatically succeed at a single stealth or deception check, representing your mastery of subterfuge.
